sections.heading: 01|Board of county commissioners - election, term
sections.text: Effective:February 25, 1972Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 322 - 109th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThe board of county commissioners shall consist of three persons who shall be elected as follows:(A) In November, 1974, and quadrennia
